Cancer.description: Cancer refers to the uncontrolled growth and spread of abnormal cells in the body. It is a complex disease that requires a multi-faceted approach for treatment. Here are some commonly used methods for curing cancer:
keywords:
{
    "Surgery": {
        "description": "Surgery is a common method used for the treatment of cancer. It involves the removal of abnormal cells or tumors from the body.",
